resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS histories_views (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , id_history TEXT, visto INT(2),num_fotos INT(2)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS histories (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , id_history TEXT, fecha TEXT,nombre_pet TEXT,id_pet TEXT,id_propietary TEXT,uris_photos TEXT

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pets (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , id_pet TEXT, name_pet TEXT,id_propietary TEXT,name_propietary TEXT,raza TEXT,peso TEXT,color TEXT,genero TEXT descripcion TEXT,edad TEXT,rating INT,type_pet INT
